# boundarySupplementaryItems

**Instance Property**

An array of the supplementary items that are associated with the boundary edges of the section, such as headers and footers.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var boundarySupplementaryItems: [NSCollectionLayoutBoundarySupplementaryItem] { get set }
```

## Configuring additional views

- **decorationItems**: An array of the decoration items that are anchored to the section, such as background decoration views.
